content.text:
# Kings River Yokuts

[yok])
| glotto           = king1260
| glottoname       = Kings River
| map              = Yokuts Kings River.svg
| imagecaption     =
| mapcaption       = Historical distribution of Kings River Yokuts
| states           = United States
| ref              =
}}
Kings River was a dialect of the Yokutsan language of California.
Dialects
There were four dialects of Kings River, Chukaymina, Michahay, Ayitcha ( Kocheyali), and Choynimni.
References
External links
* [http://cla.berkeley.edu/language/727 Kings River Yokuts, California Language Archive]
